name: Climber

#The game
The goal of the game is simple: you must reach the door at the top of the room. But it won't be easy, you will have to evade traps and enemies if you wish to get to the door and keep climbing.      
![Menu de inicio](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/objetos15162/Climber/master/Inicio.jpg)


#Enemies
During your adventure you will face bandits that are trying to prevent you from reaching the top of the building. ![Bandits will try to prevent you from progresing.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/objetos15162/Climber/master/Proyecto/Climber%202.0/images/Enemy_right_side1.png)    
If you want to, you can get rid of them, but you'll have to find a knife first.
![Knives are useful... if you widh to kill someone.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/objetos15162/Climber/master/Proyecto/Climber%202.0/images/supercuchillodelamuerte.png)      
![This game is freacking great.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/objetos15162/Climber/master/nivel3.jpg)


#Blocks
During your journey you'll realize that there is more than just your regular kind of stone blocks. Use your brain and lear to use some of them to your advantage.  


![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/objetos15162/Climber/master/Proyecto/Climber%202.0/images/Bomb_0.png)  
Bomb blocks are tricky. They look just like regular blocks, until you touch them.


![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/objetos15162/Climber/master/Proyecto/Climber%202.0/images/Spiked_block.png)  
Many adventurers have tried to get to the top doors, their blood now rests in these blocks.


![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/objetos15162/Climber/master/Proyecto/Climber%202.0/images/block_ice_small.png)      
These ones are pretty obvious, they are slippery.


#Levels
Each level will be more difficult. More enemies, traps and overall challenge await you.  
The layout of each level is different, new blocks are introduced, and more secret bombs might be hidden somewhere.


If you are interested in the game´s class organization, here's the class diagram.
